name: Saikyou Ginsei Mahjong
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

"Saikyou Ginsei Mahjong" is a mahjong game part of the "Saikyou Ginsei" series which is considered to be the best table game PC software seires. With the authentic thinking engine, you can input detailed theory of establishment of strength-building, make instant analysis on present score, remaining games and habits of other players to decide the best move. The 14 computer-controlled characters all come with unique characteristics. Please enjoy!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
